# Loading the dataset
```{r, message=FALSE}
tmp <- tempfile(fileext = ".zip")
download.file(url = "https://github.com/rudeboybert/JSE_OkCupid/raw/master/profiles.csv.zip", destfile = tmp)
okcupid_raw <- read_csv(tmp)
unlink(tmp)
```
